title: Client forced to repair?
body: I started up a league game all of a sudden the league client and game crashes and initiates a repair? like what the fuck I'm in the middle of a game!

replies.body:
I've had that happen before; it's really frustrating, but what it means is your client had corrupt files that prevented it from getting into game correctly. That resulted in it stopping itself and repairing those files that were either broken or missing. But yeah... it's really annoying! DX

After that repair, it SHOULD be working normal. If this isn't the first time it's happened though, I'd get a hold of the Tech Team [**in a ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and explaining the scenario so they can give an in depth look and work to better prevent that corruption from happening again!
